healthoverlay.configuration.title: Health Overlay Config
healthoverlay.configuration.overlayOpaci: The maximum opacity of the health overlay.
healthoverlay.configuration.overlayStart: The health level at which the overlay starts becoming visible, in half-hearts.
healthoverlay.configuration.overlayEndHe: The health level at which the overlay becomes fully opaque, in half-hearts.
healthoverlay.configuration.overlayFadeS: The speed at which the overlay fades in and out. Higher is faster.
healthoverlay.configuration.flashOpacity: The maximum opacity of the damage flash.
healthoverlay.configuration.flashFadeSpe: The speed at which the damage flash fades out. Higher is faster.
